item.title: Post: Found the micro editor
item.description: micro — apparently it’s like nano but bigger. OMG I hit C-v and it pasted the link. Just like that. Then I dragged that filemanager divider over with my mouse and it worked. A shell text editor? With key bindings that make sense to people who haven’t had their brains warped by Unix? With window splitting and tabs and JSON configuration and Lua plugins? I’m so confused.
item.content:encoded:
micro — apparently it’s like nano but bigger.

OMG I hit C-v and it pasted the link. Just like that. Then I dragged that filemanager divider over with my mouse and it worked.

A shell text editor? With key bindings that make sense to people who haven’t had their brains warped by Unix? With window splitting and tabs and JSON configuration and Lua plugins? I’m so confused.
